Posts.Content: greatgrandmasue130 wrote: I have a large painful mass of tissue hanging down under my arm after a simple mastectomy 2 weeks ago (no lymp nodes removed except sentinel) which the surgeon says is mostly fatty tissue and he couldn't remove. My Internist says she can refer me to plastic surgery for removal. Anyone else have the same problem? Log in to post a reply
